price: "Pobrinut ćemo se da ga nekako od oca njegova izmamimo, zaista ćemo tako postupiti", rekoše oni.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
